sources.title: Romeo and Juliet
sources.description:
A ballet by Sergei Prokofiev based on the tragedy of the same name by W. Shakespeare, performed by soloists of the Bolshoi Theater of the USSR.

Year of production: 1954

Directors: Arnshtam Leo, Lavrovsky Leonid
Scriptwriters: Arnshtam Leo, Lavrovsky Leonid
Composers: Prokofiev Sergey, Shebalin Vissarion
Cameramen: Shelenkov Alexander, Chen Yolanda
Production designer: Parkhomenko Alexey

Cast: Mikhail Lavrovsky, Sergey Koren, Galina Ulanova, Yuri Zhdanov, Alexey Ermolaev, Alexander Lapauri, Alexander Radunsky, Elena Ilyushchenko, I. Olenina, Sarvar Uvarov, Vladimir Levashev, Andrey Kramarevsky, Vladimir Kudryashov, Lev Lashchilin, Georgy Farmanyants

sources.title: Romeo and Juliet | Full Movie | Classic Romance Drama | Complete Mini Series
sources.description:
Romeo and Juliet - Two teenagers fall in love, but their feuding families and fate itself cause the relationship to end in tragedy.
2014. Stars: Andrea Arcangeli, Andrea Bosca, Mathieu Carrière

metadata.Plot: Against the backdrop of a venomous feud between the powerful clans of the Montagues and the Capulets in the medieval city of Verona, William Shakespeare's eternal story of teenage love unfolds. As youth's insolence arms the charming young Montague, Romeo, with dauntless courage to come uninvited to the Capulets' scintillating masked ball, a brief but thrilling encounter with the delicate dark-haired Capulet, Juliet, will pave the way for an ardent passion and a cruel romantic tragedy. Before God, the star-crossed lovers have sworn never-ending devotion despite their perilous plight; however, before the grim machinations of fate, man stands powerless. Are Romeo and Juliet destined to be together?
metadata.Writer: William Shakespeare, Franco Brusati, Masolino D'Amico
metadata.Actors: Leonard Whiting, Olivia Hussey, John McEnery
